Class RSU

  • java.lang.Object
    • RSU

  • public class RSU
extends java.lang.Object
    The RSU class models an RSU in the VANET simulator
    Author:
    sriram

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) double battery
      Current battery level at the RSU.
      private static int counter
      Class variable; counter variable.
      (package private) int id
      RSU ID
      (package private) int idle
      -1 if no one is transmitting in the segment where the RSU is located, ID of transmitting vehicle otherwise.
      (package private) boolean on
      Boolean indicating if the RSU is on.
      (package private) int pkt_id
      ID of the packet being received
      (package private) int recv_tx
      Time left to receive the packet.
      (package private) int segment_x
      RSU position in terms of segments (X coordinate)
      (package private) int segment_y
      RSU position in terms of segments (Y coordinate)
      (package private) boolean solar
      Boolean indicating if the RSU is using solar power
      (package private) int tx_id
      Vehicle transmitting the packet

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RSU(int segment_x, int segment_y)
      The constructor that initializes all variables for the object, and sets a unique ID obtained from a counter

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void resetCounter()
      Public static method that resets the unique ID generating counter

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • id

        int id
        RSU ID

      • segment_x

        int segment_x
        RSU position in terms of segments (X coordinate)

      • segment_y

        int segment_y
        RSU position in terms of segments (Y coordinate)

      • on

        boolean on
        Boolean indicating if the RSU is on.

      • solar

        boolean solar
        Boolean indicating if the RSU is using solar power

      • idle

        int idle
        -1 if no one is transmitting in the segment where the RSU is located, ID of transmitting vehicle otherwise. Doesn't mean RSU being idle or not.

      • recv_tx

        int recv_tx
        Time left to receive the packet. Transmission is ongoing.

      • tx_id

        int tx_id
        Vehicle transmitting the packet

      • pkt_id

        int pkt_id
        ID of the packet being received

      • battery

        double battery
        Current battery level at the RSU.

      • counter

        private static int counter
        Class variable; counter variable.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RSU

        RSU(int segment_x,
   int segment_y)
        The constructor that initializes all variables for the object, and sets a unique ID obtained from a counter
        Parameters:
        segment_x - the X coordinate of the RSU
        segment_y - the Y coordingate of the RSU

    • Method Detail

      • resetCounter

        public static void resetCounter()
        Public static method that resets the unique ID generating counter
